channel.title: Commands
channel.description:
Does anyone have the .java command for ::item or ::pickup? also ::empty? im using 317 project insanity as a base starting from clean :)
(already tried command from diffrent source and doesnt work..

item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")) { try { int newItemID; int newItemAmount; String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if ((newItemID <= 22534) && (newItemID >= 0)) { c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { c.sendMessage("<shad=505>That item ID does not exist.</shad>"); } }else if(args.length == 2){ newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); if ((newItemID <= 22534) && (newItemID >= 0)) { c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, 1); } else { c.sendMessage("<shad=505>That item ID does not exist.</shad>"); } } else { c.sendMessage("<shad=505>Wrong usage: ::item ID AMOUNT</shad>"); } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("<shad=12976156>Try again.</shad"); } }

Read full topic
